StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_TestDeleteDEPDischarge]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN char(9), @UserLogin varchar(15) = 'SA' AS
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME nvarchar(128)
DECLARE @NWAID int DECLARE @ContractID int DECLARE @CandidateStatusID int
DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
SET @DBID = DB_ID() SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
--- MAKE SURE THE SSN BELONGS TO A DEP DISCHARGE IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NWA N INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN AND N.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = (SELECT MAX(CS2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS2 WHERE CS2.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID) AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'E' AND CS.STATUS_CODE = 'B' AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'L')
BEGIN --- GET THE NWA_ID, CONTRACT_ID, AND CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID SELECT @NWAID = N.NWA_ID, @ContractID = C.CONTRACT_ID, @CandidateStatusID = CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID FROM CONTRACT C INNER JOIN NWA N ON C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN AND N.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = (SELECT MAX(CS2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS2 WHERE CS2.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID)
--- START THE TRANSACTION BEGIN TRANSACTION
--- UPDATE CONTRACT DATA UPDATE CONTRACT SET DISCHARGE_DATE = NULL, DISCHARGE_CODE = NULL, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION RAISERROR ('An error occurred upda.ng the discharge data in the contract record.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- RESET THE COMPONENT CODE CHANGE FLAG UPDATE NWA SET COMP_CHANGE_FLAG = NULL, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
--- UPDATE THE USER LOGIN IN CANDIDATE STATUS FOR THE CURRENT STATUS RECORD --- SO TLOG TRIGGER WILL CAPTURE LOGIN WHEN THE RECORD IS DELETED UPDATE CANDIDATE_STATUS SET USER_LOGIN = 'SA' WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = @CandidateStatusID
--- DELETE THE DEP DISCHARGE RECORD FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS DELETE FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = @CandidateStatusID
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION RAISERROR ('An error occurred dele.ng the status record.', 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- IF WE MAKE IT HERE COMMIT THE TRANSACTION COMMIT TRANSACTION END ELSE BEGIN RAISERROR ('The SSN you entered does not belong to a contract.', 16, 5, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
